website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice if you want a heavy duty, full-grain leather gun belt.
cons: Doesn't work well with multiple firearms

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this belt for about 2 months and have only used it for concealed carry less then a month. It has already lost its shape and it warping. For the price I'm very disappointed in this product. After seeing all the raving reviews I was really hoping for more. I don't carry anything large or heavy for that matter. A 9mm shield is tiny and weights very little as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Not a good belt!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. I bought this after reading all the great reviews. It came down to this belt or Hanks, and unfortunately I chose this one. After two months the stitching came loose and the loop that the excess belt goes through fell off. And this doesn't top it off. The company claims to make a belt that doesn't sag...I owned a desantis cheap belt for over 6 years that sagged less than this after wearing it for 6 more years 🤔. Not a happy customer at all. They are thick, bulky, uncomfortable and made cheaply. Trust my review...I am helping you out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This belt bleeds back
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this belt got all these great reviews, after 2 days I noticed my shorts and pants had black residue on the loops area. Turns out this thing bleeds onto your clothing. I ran a paper towel over it and sure enough, it bleeds black. Super sad but you get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Stella B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but dye bleeds from sweat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick and sturdy belt, however upon my first trip to the range out in the heat, I sweat a bit for a couple hours. The brown dye bled onto my shorts and stained them. I immediately put them through two washe cycles while they were still sweaty/wet, but the dye did not come out. I really like the belt and still use it daily, but I will be more conscious as to what pants/shorts I wear it with, and try not to get it wet. In the pictures, the reason it did not get sweaty on the right rear is because that is where my IWB holster was located, separating the shorts from my sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Stitching isn’t very good or durable. Revised- awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: The belt is sturdy and supports the CW very well. However, the stitching that runs the length of the belt on both sides has already started to come out of place. My belt which I purchased late September of 2017 already has stitching/strings hanging loosely off it. REVISED JANUARY 2018 - awesome customer service. they exchanged the belt for me at no cost.
customer_reviews.author: vmp

customer_reviews.title: Did not perform as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After 9 months I could pinch the edges and collapse it (see pic). This is just a belt.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: No one will email me from this company regarding issue with the belt
customer_reviews.text: Good belt but I can not get any one to write me back after 3 emails I did not want to write a review until I spoke with them regarding a issue I have with the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Kobeck

customer_reviews.title: Received used Belt
customer_reviews.text: Received extremely used belt with frayed inner belt where someone's holster had been carried. I have reached out to Relentless Tactical in hopes for a fair exchange for a new product. I have not heard anything back at this point. I will update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Doug1

customer_reviews.title: NO CUSTOMER  SERVICE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!! I contacted this company's website to request a return/refund for this belt since it was completely useless and unusable for me. The belt was just too wide, it would not slide through the belt loops of any of my clothing; trousers/shorts etc. I contacted the company on their website and on the Amazon website and NEVER received ANY reply whatsoever!!! No phone call, no email reply, nothing. Since I have never worn it, and it sits in the box on on my dresser, you can figure my money was completely wasted!!!!! Might as well throw it away or donate it to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great 100% leather great for my 1791 leather holster . Customer service excellent i had to change my size so the did the change no question ask they send me one right away no money out of my pocket they paid for all shipping cost i highly recommended is very strong build you get what you paid your paying for quality and life warranty .......... you just cannot fake leather this is a hundred percent handmade
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan aviles

customer_reviews.title: everyone notice the squeeze songs
customer_reviews.text: it has squeeze song for every body move after I put the holster on, its useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: The best belt I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: The best belt I’ve ever owned. In the past I’ve gone to police supply shops to buy heavy duty belts. They have gone the way of cheap foreign made crap. I searched Amazon and found this belt. It was priced higher than other belts I was comparing. My thinking was I don’t mind spending for quality. Was I surprised when I unboxed this belt! I’m fairly certain I could tow a car with it! It was exactly as advertised. Well built, high quality. Not only is it superb for conceal carry, it’s a great looking belt for everyday use. It’s thick and supports my holster perfectly. I highly recommend this belt. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ken B.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This belt holds any weapon in any style carry IWB or OWB securely without sagging. I've carried anything from revolvers to sub compact semi automatic pistols comfortably. The belt clips on inside the waistband holsters clip onto this belt and stay where you put them. The belt does not twist or sag even when you are sweating! After several weeks of daily carry in all kinds of conditions this belt has held up. Better than any gun belt I've ever owned. It is well made and can double as a work belt. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Way over 40 Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Buckle
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the leather weight and thickness necessary to carry, but the buckle is really cheap. Try a carhart roller belt. If you do order this belt only order one size larger than your waste at most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made but sizing is off and no steel core.
customer_reviews.text: Nice belt very thick. But advertised as gun belt and popped up when I searched for steel core belts. This is just a thick well made leather belt. Also be careful of the sizing, their measurement chart tells you to measure your current belt from current hole to middle of the buckle. That put me at a 42 with a recommended belt size of 46, WAY TOO BIG. The size requested says pant size, which I am a 38 and would have given me a 42 size belt. Go off pant size and not their sizing chart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Locktite screws holding buckle to belt loop prior to wearing !
customer_reviews.text: The leather is high quality. The buckle is fine. The two screw/bolts came loose. Fell out, I didn't know till the belt felt loose and the IWB holster came loose...didn't fall. If you buy this belt...remove the bolts and locktite them in place. I'm going to try Hanks belt. I'm going to use heavy duty rivits to repair this belt. I was going to order their "Best" bonded belt, But ?????
customer_reviews.author: roadbike rider

customer_reviews.title: Read this!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I e had a few belts throw out the years. But this one is solid. I’m glad my dad didn’t whoop my behind with this kind of belt. I have been wearing it around with my side arm and without. It’s sturdy yet comfortable. Lightweight yet tight fitting. Could become my everyday belt. I played around with the “should I get this $60 belt, or the $21 dollar belt that offered 2 dollar saving at checkout”. I’m pessimistic and was blown away by the quality of this belt. We all have a reason to carry day-to-day. Some just need a good belt to last. I’m happy that I found both. Thanks RT!
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gun belt!
customer_reviews.text: This is for the Relentless Tactical "the ultimate gun belt" I've had this belt for a month now, been using it daily. I keep it pretty snug for my IWB holster, so there is some pressure on the holes in the belt. That said, there is literally 0 wear on any of the holes. No wear anywhere aside from where I rubbed up against some brick, but that is by no stretch a manufacturer problem. 10/10 recommend this belt. Might pick up a brown one in the near future too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: High quality durable belt
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! I own two of these belts (just recently purchased my 2nd, because I wanted a black and brown belt), and gave a third belt to my Dad as a gift. He's a retired LEO and told me the belt reminded him of his service belt. The belt itself is very sturdy. After a few years of almost daily use, I haven't noticed any cracking or fraying, and the belt's holes have not become stretched out or deformed. They also do an excellent job of retaining a gun holster! I really can't see anything wrong w these belts. 100% recommend buying one. It will last you for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Metz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical to pay so much for a belt but not anymore. I've heard for years that it's easier to carry concealed with a heavy belt that's dedicated to the task. Until now, I always thought people saying that were just trying to sell belts. All this time I've been missing out by attempting to carry concealed with my regular old belts that I thought were "just fine" for the task. This belt makes it easy to comfortably carry a big Beretta 92FS in an appendix or strong side paddle SERPA. Never was able to really pull that off with my old belts!
customer_reviews.author: dancingchicken

customer_reviews.title: Great belt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt, it's sturdy, comfortable, looks good, too. True thick leather! It will not curl or twist if something heavy is attached to it to be carried. It keeps the pants up and where they belong. One can hang one's own weight on it and the belt takes it with ease like a rope. This makes the belt even a tool for the backcountry, hiking, or camping if the need arises to assign it to some kind of odd (not genuinely belt specifically) jobs, like pull your buddy out of a mud hole.
customer_reviews.author: hiker

customer_reviews.title: Do you enjoy freedom around your waist?!
customer_reviews.text: Tired of your pants falling down? Disgusted by cheaply made belts that stretch out, or deform? Do you love to carry John Moses Browning's most perfect creation (the M1911), but find the immense weight of freedom to be simply too much for your current wimpy, inferior belt? Then look no further. I personally own three of these belts, and I'll never own anything but. They're rugged, well constructed, and serve their purpose with flying colors. Who am I? Well, pretty much just some hillbilly railroader from Michigan, but if there's one thing I know, it's quality, and America. Buy it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: David Foster

customer_reviews.title: Quality, price and longevity are key in my case!
customer_reviews.text: I now own 2 of these belts, my first one was slightly large in size but still usable. I decided to order the next smaller size because these belts are SO awesome for carrying of firearm. For the price you pay which is very reasonable and the quality you receive along with how these belts hold up, you can not beat it. Had my first belt well over a year and it still works and looks great! Just changed to the smaller size and expect this one will last me for many years! Dont hesitate! You will be happy you ordered one!
customer_reviews.author: kornhole

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: This belt is incredibly flexible, especially for how thick it is. But really, it's way more flexible than any belt I've ever owned. I have had it for several months now, wearing it every day with jeans and there is no signs of wear whatsoever. Granted I haven't been concealed carrying very often recently, but either way this belt is holding up amazingly compared to any belt of equivalent or greater value. It is very thick making it a slightly tight fit in some of my jeans, but it is not a problem. This belt holds my gun securely, it does as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: dgb

customer_reviews.title: Belt dye bleeds after just a few hours of light wear.  Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I noticed some negative reviews that mentioned problem but I ignored them as 1-offs because of the other glowing reviews. It is a sturdy belt, but compared to the Hank's belt it is replacing there are two problems. First and most importantly, the black dye BLEEDS onto your pants! That is with only 3-4 hours of wear around my air conditioned house. Secondly, the edges near the buckle were noticeably rough to the point of chaffing my little beer belly. Returning and going back to Hanks.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  It is sturdy and stiff and looks good too.
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn it for a week now but it is fabulous. Exactly what I expected. It doesn't sag even with a heavy holster. The true test will be if it's still not sagging in a few years. Regarding Relentless Tactical Customer Service, they're fabulous. I contacted them because I ordered the wrong length and they immediately sent me a new one, free of charge and paid for the return as well. I WILL be buying more stuff from this company.
customer_reviews.author: hakosama

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt for CC or just everyday Life!
customer_reviews.text: going to be honest, at unboxing I was impressed with the packaging and the fact that the belt came with a couple of gifts. Included in the package were a rubber bracelet and a decal. My initial impression of the belt was that it was going to be too bulky as it is very thick and that's where it gets its strength. I did notice that the leather was very good quality and surprisingly soft (Not stiff) and limber for how thick it was. after trying the belt on and wearing it for the week I have to say that this is one well-made belt. It handled my CC needs very well and this belt does it in style.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Works

customer_reviews.title: The only belt I wear now
customer_reviews.text: This belt is 1.46" wide and .23" thick. I am retired law enforcement and carry concealed every day. I have worn this belt now every day for a month using both IWB and OWB holsters. I have several other carry belts from well known makers. One is too thin and has finally worn out after many years, another is so thick it will not accommodate some of my holsters, mag pouches and belt loops. This belt is just right. I love it. The roller on the buckle makes it easy to adjust and cuts down on wearing out the leather. It fits all my holsters and belt loops. Money well spent. Great job Relentless Tactical.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Merrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The belt I received was exactly what I was hoping for. I’ve had to resort to wearing suspenders all the time as my normal belts don’t keep my pants from succumbing to gravity... I have no butt...then add the weight of my EDC and I’m constantly tugging at my britches. The belt is so far doing it’s job plus it’s very comfortable. I was concerned at first that the stiffness would be uncomfortable but it hasn’t caused any problems so far. Thanks for a great product. Definitely have other items on my Father’s Day list. God bless...
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: So many good reviews, why bother?
customer_reviews.text: Because these are well-made belts. I purchased a brown one and black one, and they're both far better than any I have owned. Additionally, customer service is top notch... the stitching started to come out a bit on the black one, and I contacted them directly, and within a week I had a brand new one in my mailbox, plus a 20% off coupon for a future purchase. Made in U.S.A. and worth every penny. Will be making future purchases from this company absolutely and sharing with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Knight

customer_reviews.title: Quality hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I carry a weapon everyday, well at least everyday I leave my house. In the past using an off the shelf belt it came down to tightening the belt to the point I couldn't breath or always pulling my pants up when walking. With this belt I don't have any of these problems anymore, in fact I almost forget I'm carrying a weapon, almost. You might say well this belt is expensive, well go to any quality store not wally world and look at the prices of belts but most of all look at where the belt is manufactured. I would rather spend $15-20 more for products made in the USA then sending my money to the Communist in China.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Ok belt, too flexible for a gun belt.
customer_reviews.text: Not a terrible belt. Leather is good, buckle is good, but it's too flexible. Even with a 21oz compact pistol, the belt tries to twist off the hip. Tried a few different holster types, same result. You really need to tighten this one up to keep the support. If it had a plastic insert (or stiffer leather) to keep the belt more rigid, then I would call it ultimate.
customer_reviews.author: TOM A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, thick, rugged leather, removable buckle. I chose black, stitched, and its perfect for me. All so busy, tough to get free return ship thru here, but seller has a belt xchg program for mis sizing, Im in that now, looks my ans due to crazy busy sales it seems. Too many orders offer free returns, but cannot access same upon processing return, and have to seek direct comm w just serv, IF you can... GREAT BELT. UPDATE; CUST SERV IS GREAT!!!! 1 day later....
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Quality and customer service do still exist.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a concealed carry guy and it's been difficult, until now, to find a belt that would stand up to the rigors of wearing a weapon every day and he's not a little guy. We looked and finally found this company and it's right here in our area so we are happy to do business with local small business. It is everything and more than we expected. It's a little rigid but will soften up as he wears it. It seems totally worth the money. Quality and craftsmanship show that Relentless Tactical has pride in their products.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Maust

customer_reviews.title: Solid belt!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and sturdy, feels secure. I purchased this because I carry ccw both in the waist and outside the waist and was tired of flimsy belts. The heaviest gun I carry is a Sig P229 legion. Only thing I hate is that because this is real leather, my owb holster makes a sound with this belt, which is the kydex rubbing against the belt where the belt loops of the holster rest on the belt. Besides that I use this belt to open carry when I’m on duty (plain clothes detective) and I never have any issues. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Size chart did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try one of your heavy gun belts, I used the size chart as was described in the information regarding such. When i put it around my waist, it did not get snug enough until the 'last hole' in the belt. I also ordered a 'speed Loader' specific for the Springfield XD hand guns. The magazine's for the XDM are 19+1, The speed loader would not fit over the shoulder of the magazine even though it said XD on it . The whole order was wrong, so I got irritated and returned the entire order for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Warren D Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Appears very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I promise to report back if this belt doesn't hold up as well as my 20 year old Desantis did but right now as I wear it it appears it will outlast me! Very impressed with the quality and attractiveness of this belt and wear it as my casual wear belt almost always with or without a holster. Well done! I will say that while I take a 36 inch pant I did not go with the 40 but the 38 and I have notches to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Longbowsafari

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This belt is extremely well made and tough! It is made with very high quality leather and hardware. It will easily hold the weight of a holster and any other concealed carry accessories. It also looks very good. This is the second one I purchased; it was so good that I needed to have it in multiple colors. I bought the first one 15 months ago and have not had any issues with it. This belt is a must have for your collection. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Swifty

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Gun Belt
customer_reviews.text: I like the belt. It is clearly made with good materials and is solid. I can see this belt lasting a long time. My only thing with this belt is the noise it makes with my gun holster. I sound like I'm carrying a horse saddle when I'm walking. I know it's from the leather rubbing together. I'm going to try some clips or something to hold the holster still. Other than that, this is a great belt and I am well pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Rosenbusch

customer_reviews.title: Feels fantastic, perfect for normal CCW
customer_reviews.text: I bought this belt after searching for a replacement; I wanted an in-between from semi-casual, semi-formal use but able to handle CCW use. I came across this belt. It wasn't a super thick duty belt - I am not carrying a radio, firearm, cuffs, mags, etc., just a CCW and some mags. I ordered the belt and since it is real leather and a small company, I received a belt with a small scuff on the outside of the belt. I went through the exchange process, and had a new belt in 2 days. It fits nicely and looks fantastic, and doesn't sag when used for CCW.
customer_reviews.author: Minority Report

customer_reviews.title: I was impressed. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I can say without a doubt, this company, there products both get a thumbs up. The card inside the nice box the belt comes with also states, if your belt doesn't fit, they will exchange it directly from the maker, no hassle. That says a lot about the company. The belt, is fantastic. Very tough, not cheap or thin leather, Solid screw to hold buckle (yes you can replace the buckle). Worth every penny spent and will most likely get another. Hoster stays tight with no sagging, either IWB or out, I can say this, it is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Restoration & Conservation

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt but the sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: They really need to inform the customer how long the extra tail of the belt is (past the buckle). I bought the appropriate size for my waist as listed, and this left me with an 8" tail past the buckle! For a gun belt this extra tail makes it impossible to attach your magazine pouches on your left hip. Please account for this problem and inform the customer. This is a gun belt, we are going to need to carry extra rounds, therefore we need space on our left hip. These super long tails are not going to work!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best carry or everyday wear belt on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this belt. I recently lost weight and dropped two pant sizes. I needed a new belt an the choice was obvious. I wore my 1st belt every day and wanted the exact belt as before. The quality is unmatched. The sizing chart is exactly correct. My belt was delivered the very day I ordered it. Perfect fit, perfect quality, same day shipping. Order with confidence you won't be disappointed. No regrets. One of my best online purchases ever. Better than advertised and I'm pretty picky. This won't be my last order from Relentliss Tactical I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 34 pants and according to the sizing guide I would be a 38, but I opted for the 36. I carry OWB and the 36 fits great for me. I buckle at the 4th hole and that gives me about a 3-4 inch tail that extends just past the first loop and right under my double mag pouch. Great quality and great fit. The only thing that would make this belt better would be an option for black hardware.
customer_reviews.author: R. Earl

customer_reviews.title: A made in America, excellent quality belt that is backed by outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I received this belt as a gift from my daughter, and even though it was a couple of sizes too large, I wore it for a week because it looks so good. Then I contacted Relentless Tactical about a possible exchange. I expected to pay something because I had worn the belt. Not only did they not charge me any additional money; they sent me a shipping label for a free return. Outstanding customer service! Plus this is a good looking belt suitable for wearing with a suit as well as casual. Thank you Relentless Tactical!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin King, Author

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Belt
customer_reviews.text: I had a belt probably 30 years ago that was just great and lasted me 25 or 30 years. I haven't found one like it since. I was looking in the wrong places. I didn't necessarily want a belt for carrying a firearm. I wanted a quality belt that if I chose to carry I could. Guess what? Relentless has the belt for you. It is a quality leather belt. The sizing is right too. Thick for support and comfortable. I love this thing. I expect to have this belt a very long time. I may even conceal carry with it. It is definitely strong enough for that as well. Ketone, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Altech

customer_reviews.title: My Father loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this belt and holster as a gift for my Father. He loves leather and how it molds around your particular gun. It was a surprise when he received it although he had picked it out earlier but I got a phone call right away saying how much he liked it and how well it fit his new 9mm. It’s hard to find the perfect gift but I believe this came very close. A Ferrari is really what he wants!
customer_reviews.author: Debnovo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, well made belt.
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated last year and almost purchased this belt, wish I had. I recently, within the last week did order and receive on time this awesome belt. This is the most amazing belt I've ever owned, quality craftsmanship is definitely 5 stars and worth every dollar. I made a mistake last year and purchased a less expensive belt that fell apart. Fortunately I was able to receive my money back, they did have a great warranty. I now have the best of the best..... .
customer_reviews.author: RMH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this belt!! To me, a proper leather belt, if formed into a loop will hold its shape when held horizontally. This thing not only does that, it feels so strong I could destroy stuff with it. I purchased the belt for normal belt use, and went by the sizing chart but found the size was just a bit too large. Relentless customer service was perfect and exchanged the belt with me with no charge whatsoever, all goodies with the original purchase included. Do not be afraid to try this belt, it is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan D.

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely happy with the quality of this belt. When ordering, I am a size 36 for jeans and was struggling between ordering 38 or 40 because I read some people ordering too big or too small. I simply used their measurement system they provide which told me to get a size 40 and it fits perfectly! Enough room for me to loosen it a notch or 2 if going IWB. Great seller who followed up with me to make sure I was satisfied. I will be giving this family owned company my business for years to come. Going to buy another belt in Black and already ordered 2 of their holsters. Quality stuff they make!!!
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid belt for handguns
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Even from the pictures and description on Amazon I had no idea how solid this belt was. Top notch construction, stitching and leather dying. The roller belt buckle makes for easy adjustment especially for a belt as solid as this. I would recommend this belt to anyone and would definitely buy again...although this one should last me a long long time! I will buy other products from Relentless Tactical
customer_reviews.author: wood master

customer_reviews.title: If you carry concealed or open, or if you just eant a high quality belt, this id it.
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. Obviously well made. I’d been looking for a belt that would both support my IWB holster and a paddle holster. Web belts, as much as i love’em, didn’t work. They sagged and pulled my pants down with them. Now even when I’m not carrying, i wear this belt. My son gave me a very distinctive buckle for my birthday and i put it in for the original buckle. Then i decided I really like thr original buckle and replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Barewalker 58

customer_reviews.title: This belt is actually a bargain... the quality is that good.
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this belt months ago. It was sitting in my 'Save for later' portion of my cart while I contemplated whether I really needed to spend $60.00 for a belt. After wearing the belt for the better part of a week, I can say that this is easily the best belt I've ever owned. The leather is incredibly thick, the stitching is meticulous, the buckle is beefy and solid, the whole belt just smacks of American-made quality. I've spent $30 or $40 for a belt repeatedly only to have the leather stretch, tear, or come unglued. $60.00 is a bargain for this belt, it's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Todd P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Company
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I have owned the belt for about eight months and warn it often. It has held up beautifully and still looks brand new. I did experience an issue with it about a week ago. When I was taking the belt off, I noticed that one of the grommets which are actually screws were missing. The belt still worked because the other Gromit was holding the buckle in place. I wrote the company a quick note stating that I lost one of the Chicago screws grommets. I received a six pack of grommets from the company within three days. Good place to do business with . Ed
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this belt for the last three years almost daily and have just returned to buy another one. Fortunately I got a little leaner and just need a smaller size. I wear this both on and off duty. Firearms carried wherever legal. This belt has held up remarkably well and i have not gone easy on it. I've worn it with a plate carrier and thigh rig holster. I've worn it with a tshirt and shorts. It's primary use is in business casual attire for work but it has even seen semi-formal events. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The Difference is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a few things over quarantine that I didn't think I necessarily needed, including a few holsters and this belt. I was disappointed in my new iwb holster because it didn't sit well with my belt and was uncomfortable. I saw a few good reviews for the Relentless Tactical gun belt making a difference, so I figured I'd give it a shot. Wow! What a difference it made! My holster is supported and clips perfectly. It sits comfortably without movement. This belt exceeded my expectations by a long shot. If you question whether or not your belt is that important in CCW, you must give Relentless Tactical a try. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: SOLID!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had the perfect belt when I purchased a carhart belt...HA!!!! Relentless is by far the BEST.....PERIOD!! Much thicker than the carhart, great feel and really solid. The buckle was very comfortable and the belt felt so, sooo, soooooo comfortable. This is the best gun belt I have ever owned. This is as all my reviews, a real review and you will not go wrong. The only mistake I made was just buying the brown, now I will return and purchase the black.
customer_reviews.author: Botanique Baron Samedi

customer_reviews.title: Very durable,great price.
customer_reviews.text: This belt is very stiff. It carries my 5” colt 1911 OWB just fine. No sagging at all. It’s the heaviest side arm I own. I carry it all the time. The belt easily threads through my belt loops and stays in place. Easy to buckle and very comfortable. I’m actually trying it it and am going to order another to wear at work as I carry a large Motorola two way radio, a leather an and a flashlight on my belt. I now know this belt will fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: S. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted
customer_reviews.text: I like how it is constructed and that it is made in the US. It is available on line but it reminds me of leather goods that were widely available in local haberdashers when I was growing up. At that time all the leather goods were made in the US. Don't know in what state this is made or where the company is doing business. They only have a web site and a email to contact them. Email: Info@Relentless-Tactical.com. But great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This is a gunfighters pant-belt!
customer_reviews.text: Belt is a great addition to casual or undercover use, but professional enough for court! I bought this belt for taking my paddle holster to court when I can’t sport my full duty belt, but found i’m Using it just as much on my off days with my in the waist holster (also from Relentless Tactical)! Very good craftsmanship! Definitely have more peace of mind if ever I need to draw out this belt won’t wobble, stretch, or break like cheapy big box store brand would! I’ll gladly shell out a few extra bucks for peace of mind when it comes to my life saving gear!
customer_reviews.author: Pen1s

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt
customer_reviews.text: These belts are fantastic. I originally bought a relentless belt with the steel insert, many years ago. I have since found that the standard double layer leather belt works just as well. I have no sag in the belt when wearing OWB. Even with a full size G17. My normal carry is a G19 so no slouching there either. They look great (the belt) and retain their look even over several years. The buckle is extremely strong and have had no problems whatsoever with these belts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for concealed carry.
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a belt that would last. I am not concerned with concealed carry. Though obviously given all the positive reviews, it is quite useful for that purpose. All the belts I bought at the brick and mortar stores didn't last that long. The prices were much less, but you get what you pay for. Cheap price, crappy belt. This belt has outlasted all of them and is still going. Don't fall for the false economy of a low priced belt. For all the cheap belts you buy, you could have bought this one twice over and it will last you five times as long as the other belts. .
customer_reviews.author: InfidelUberAlles

customer_reviews.title: Loose stitches , 2 yr life.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the black stitched belt and brown basket weve for two years now. The stitches started coming loose on rhe black one after about 6 months. I wear it almost daily alternating with the brown basket weave belt made by the same company. They are utilized for their intended purpose, as a ccw belt. I guess two years is the life expectancy for a carry belt. I've noticed both belts are starting to sag from carrying either a Sig P239 or P365 in a paddle owb kydex holster.
customer_reviews.author: Neil B

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime, and will pay for itself many times over
customer_reviews.text: I always just bought the like, twelve dollar department store belts when I needed one, and they worked for a bit. If you wear a belt daily you will be blown away at the difference in durability and comfort. Really can't recommend these enough. And with how quickly I burnt through cheap belts it was already saving me money after a few months, and shows no signs of wearing out. Night and day difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, but still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a good thick belt that works as it was designed - it securely holds your pants AND carry concealed holster. Looks great too. I really like that the buckle includes a "roller" to save wear and tear on the leather at its greatest pressure point - right where the buckle is fastened. The rating above include the category "Security features," but I'm not sure what that means.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't handle G26/holster
customer_reviews.text: I gave this belt a chance but it did not meet my expectations. My G26/ CrossBreed supertuck combo was a little too much for this "gun belt" to handle. My pants sag if I don't tighten the belt to an uncomfortable setting. I tried a Gun belt at a local gun store that was one size too small but it handled my combo carry awesome. The belt was more expensive but they didn't have my size. I saw this, the great reviews and took a gamble. It is in return process. This is a very good leather belt for daily wear but not a true "Gun belt". I'm skeptical at the majority of reviews on this product.
customer_reviews.author: the man

customer_reviews.title: Effective Efficiency
customer_reviews.text: Have several gun belts I wear to conceal and carry my personal firearms - recently acquired a couple of pistols all dressed out in black - I've wanted to try this manufacture so I thought I would - wow... I'm pleased - have worn this belt now for two weeks for everyday carry - carrying different sizes of pistols of different weights - no sag or stretch at all - adjust it comfortable just above my hip bones and it's there. Doesn't move or snag - I really like this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: The belt will last me the rest of my life!
customer_reviews.text: Its intended purpose is concealed carry, but I just wanted a belt to hold up my jeans and my cell phone. I had been going through a belt each year and got tired of the crap. This belt is solid leather. It could be used to fix the harness on a team of draft horses! It will keep your britches where they are supposed to be. It will carry any sidearm you can holster.
customer_reviews.author: CarterAllen

customer_reviews.title: Quality Belts, Run a Little Big, But Stood by Their Word!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two belts, black & brown, very high quality and durable belts. Ordered size 42 (size 38 pants), and belts ran a little big for sizing. Instead of buckling the middle (4th) hole, it was comfortable at the last (7th) hole. Relentless ownership honored their word, free returns and free replacement belts arrived within 3 days of creating replacement order. Now have both in size 40 belt, and comfortably buckle using the 3rd and 4th holes. Highly recommend, and would order again. Belts look professional (office job not allowing me to carry), yet durable when carrying my concealed holster/weapon. Thanks again Relentless Tactical!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one two years ago. Best belt I’ve ever had. Heavy duty, supports whatever I hang on it. Would definitely by again. Suggestion: a dab of Loctite on the screws might not be a bad idea. One of them on mine came loose and fell out where I found it. I haven’t put any on and it hasn’t come apart again, either, but it seems like a good idea....
customer_reviews.author: Penrod

customer_reviews.title: Example of the best American craftmanship.  Handsome & sturdy belt.
customer_reviews.text: Quality exceeded my expectations - which were pretty high due to cost & adverts. Well worth the price. Bought size per the guidelines, and is "spot on", but even if off a size or so, it would still fit! Delivered fast; and the enclosed sticker, wristband, and coupon were pleasant surprises - shows that Relentless Tactical cares about their customers. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Size Charting
customer_reviews.text: Katie: I wrote a previous review on a belt I'll be returning in reference to the size chart. I normally wear a size 40 pants/cargo shorts and per the sizing chart, ordered a 44 which ended up being too large and my gun and holster were being pulled down and cargo shorts were almost falling off. I reordered a size 42 which fits much better and allows to be tight but not too constrictive. Might want to update the sizing chart. The belt is very well made though, so besides that, i'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FOLLOW THE SIZING CHART!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my belt. As soon as it arrived I took off the belt I have been using for the last few years and put on the new one. Immediate difference.... Very comfortable, no sagging, no constantly hiking up my pants. So far so good, and at this point I wish I had not been such a cheapskate for so long and dropped the $60 and bought this belt a long time ago. Some of the reviews say that the belt sagged after a while. If that happens in the next few months I will edit my review.
customer_reviews.author: NicNac

customer_reviews.title: Now THIS is a gun belt!
customer_reviews.text: VERY thick and strong belt. This sucker is NOT going to sag or fold on you regardless of the weight holster you use. If anything, it’s borderline TOO thick. It fits through your belt loops firmly. After buckling, trying to feed the loose end back through your belt loop so it doesn’t stick out is a major battle. But overall I am very pleased. I was so tired of buying “heavy” leather belts only to have them roll and fold with repeated use. I went through 5 belts before finding this beauty. I doubt I’ll wear it out in my lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great belt
customer_reviews.text: this is my second belt from this company and i would recommend this. its great and thick. the first one i got 2 1/2 years ago and its still looks like new. i don't wear it every day cause i have others. i need to replace the one i was wearing cause it was falling apart, so i got another one that i know will last. be safe out there and always carry
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: A real asset for my concealed carry!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only used it one time as I just bought it but it fulfills my requirement for ease of draw from my GB leather holster. I carry just about every day and this belt is well made and looks good. My old belt required both my hands to draw my pistol. This belt makes it easy to use one hand to draw. Not doing any fast draw stuff but I have been put into a situation twice lately when being approached by a man and another by a mean dog. Found out you don't have much time to get your weapon out and ready. Glad it is made in the USA and great craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: bfd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Belt, Be Careful On Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Up front, I LIKE this belt. I originally purchased one at retail based on their recommended sizing. Bad idea. Most fat people thing their waist is smaller than it really is. If that's you, work with their chart. If not, grab a belt you currently use, MEASURE from where the prong hits the frame to the CURRENT hole, and that;s your waist size. If you are using this for IWB concealed carry, add two inches. Any bigger and you'll look like a dork. Trust me. The retail store did not have the correct size so I came to Amazon and ordered the correct size, but I DID purchase. You'll like it. EXCELLENT QUALITY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Attila The Hungry

customer_reviews.title: A BELT TRULY DESIGNED FOR CONCEALED CARRY
customer_reviews.text: I have had this belt for two months and am extremely happy with it. It is of excellent quality and craftsmanship. It is a "heavy duty" belt that is "thicker" and wider than the majority of belts found in a clothing store. yet it is very supple and flexible. It snugly hold a custom leather holster against the hip and the holster will not slip or dislodge from where it is placed. The sizing system that is described is spot on. The hole that I use gives me three extra holes on each side. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a well made belt for general use and especially for concealed carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry M

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made Belt!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and receive the brown belt from Amazon two days later, as soon as I saw it I was in love with this belt. love the looks and feel of the belt on my waist. The only thing that I mess up on was that I ordered the wrong seize! I called Relentless Tactical and talked with Jennifer and a new replacement belt is on the way with free shipping to and from me... What a great Company to do business with!!! Ken
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: I think this belt will hold any pistol up to several pounds -- it is really solid and well-made. They offer an excellent guarantee of workmanship. I'm glad I purchased this belt. Looks very nice; not like a dress belt, but like any belt you might see around town. Good if you don't want to look 'tactical'. Very nice. Based on the quality of the belt, I also ordered a 1911 holster from Relentless Tactical.
customer_reviews.author: Gecko

customer_reviews.title: Good SOLID belt!
customer_reviews.text: I went with the popular reviews and took a chance on this belt, and I couldn't be happier. I ordered 4" larger than my waist and got a nice fit, but sometimes I like to wear snug depending on what I'm carrying, and needed another hole. Since I do a lot of leather work I figured "No problem" and got out my cutting punch. And promptly learned how SOLID this belt is. (Dye is all the way through, BTW.) It's dense and rigid, and still looks just fine as a dress belt. Just make sure your pant loops can handle 1.5".
customer_reviews.author: darthmikey

customer_reviews.title: Well Crafted gun belt
customer_reviews.text: Bought two belts in different sizes in solid brown. We were very pleased with this Relentless Ultimate belt. Well crafted, good color, seems study enough, fits easily in belt loops. Just enough too large that both need to be returned. Will purchase directly from company to get a 1 3/4" belt loop to replace one of these. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Great concealed carry gun belt!!!
customer_reviews.text: This concealed carry belt from Relentless Tactical is fantastic! After reading all reviews on Amazon and online I went ahead and purchased. The belt is thick and very well made. Best concealed carry belt I have owned to date. A must for any concealed carry owner whether you have a IWB or OWN holster. Don’t hesitate, get one now!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Smithson

customer_reviews.title: Bleeds from sweat, some peeling.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very rigid belt. I have worn it now for about 6 months and the belt loops have not become oval or stretched. It has bleed off onto my clothing on several occasions and stains. If it wasnt for that would have given 5 stars. Having some slight peeling as well. Still a great EDC belt for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Prepper

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Functional
customer_reviews.text: The belt arrived as scheduled and I found the style pleasing. The cut of the leather and stitching showed great craftsmanship and quality of work. The ease of fastening the buckle was surprising and it passed the performance test with my holstered weapon. The belt did not roll nor crease, but held in support close to my waist. Great purchase and I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Walter T.

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the belt I was using it's at least 40% thicker leather. (See picture for comparison) Both belts in the picture are 100% full grain leather. I find it to be made well and expect it to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Great gun belt!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this belt because I needed an inexpensive gun belt to wear while working around the ranch. I was very surprised to find out how well it was made. I’ve been wearing it for several months now and it is just as well made and looks just as good as much more expensive gun belts I own. This is a very well made and durable gun belt. At least three of my friends have purchased this belt after seeing mine. Holds a full sized 1911 without sagging or tilting out.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Beefy high quail belt
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt so much I wear it all the time, not just when carrying a firearm. This is how a belt should be, thick, solid quality leather. I hate paying $30+ for cheap crap belts in the store. Half the time they are a mix or leather and synthetic materials bonded (glued) together. They quickly fall apart. I feel like this belt will last me for many many years. I have two, one in black and one in brown.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Private

customer_reviews.title: Great belt for CC. Keeps everything in place.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is THICK and sturdy (that's what she said!). It keeps the holster and yeet cannon in place. Also keeps pants from falling down which is frowned upon in most establishments. Seriously, it's a good belt and does what it's supposed to at a pretty good price compared to a couple other brands that are out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing after some use
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t worn much yet, but seems sturdy enough. Edit: I’ve now worn this belt a lot and one of the screw posts up by the buckle managed to fall apart. Luckily, I heard it hit the floor and was able to find both pieces. Disappointing quality for the “ultimate concealed carry belt.” When I choose equipment, it has to work 100% of the time, not most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great price but did not like the product. Way too stiff and rigid.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality product and even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Loved my first belt from them but lost so much weight I needed to have it shortened. When I told them I had trouble getting the buckle off they told me to send in the belt and they would send me a new one! I was so awestruck by the level of committment to ensuring customer satisfaction I ordered another belt in a different color from them. Follow their instructions for sizing and you should get the appropriately sized belt. Works well with my Blade Tech (OWB) holding an alloy framed CZ 75 D PCR as well as with my Sig Sauer P238 in a Concealment Express (AIWB).
customer_reviews.author: K. M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Best belt ever
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy that has to have a belt that doesn’t stretch much for I have to have it tight enough so my pants don’t fall. This is it. The best belt I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: englisc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent belt
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I needed an appropriate belt for conceal carry. One week of using an IWB holster and my regular belt, my pants sagged funny and the holster was already ruining my normal belt. Ordered this, and was amazed at the thickness/strength of it. As soon as I put it on, I noticed it held the holster in place better, and it was much more noticible when I sat down and the gun and holster didn't sag. I wear this with an Aliengear IWB and a dual pocket sheath holding a multi-tool and flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA, so PLEASE support them !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great belt, I know, I'll have this belt longer than any other belt I have ever had ! Great quality, made in the USA ! How can we change the USA if we don't support USA made products ? If the price is a little more, what do you think it will be, because we all want more money from our jobs, right .So, if any one read this PLEASE support this company, at least buy one product.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip King

customer_reviews.title: Two year review
customer_reviews.text: After wearing the h*ck out of this belt for a couple of years I can give it a 5 out of 5. Well-made, thick and sturdy - it has withstood. The width of the belt and thickness of the leather itself make it more comfortable than any of the other belts I own. It became an instant go-to for jeans and khaki’s. I am back to buy another in black. Bottom line: heartily recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RP~ZAreviewr

customer_reviews.title: Well made and keeps holster up without over tightening belt
customer_reviews.text: Holds a holster up nice without tightening the belt up too much. I can't comment on how it will wear over time yet, but initial impressions and a day out hunting using this belt with a holster look promising so far. It's well made and I don't see why it won't last a long time. The holster didn't sag all day and my back wasn't hurting after a day out in the boondocks like it does with other belts that I have to over tighten to keep the holster riding correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Plain Truth

customer_reviews.title: the best belt I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good quality belt for some time. This belt has a great buckle (strong) and the leather is very firm. just what I was looking for. this will be a great ccw belt for my holster and mag cases. I bought one in black and one in brown and will use them for both dress and carrying my weapon. thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: As a concealed carrier with a ccw I have found every day carry to get a little uncomfortable as the day wears on. I kept reading that a good gun belt was a necessity so I finally broke down and put out the cash for one. What a difference. I can now carry a full size glock or 1911 with no discomfort. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Seems perfect for a casual conceal and carry belt
customer_reviews.text: Just out of the package the thing is unbelievably stiff which is really what you want from a tactical belt. Just wide enough to hold my conceal and carry Springfield with under the waistband holster. Will try to update this after I’ve worn it for a few months to see how durability is, but so far, pretty amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
